lead_paragraph: Roger Federer thinks a tiebreaker at 12-12 would be the best compromise following calls for Wimbledon to step into line with the U.S. Open and scrap long deciding sets.

headline.print_headline: Federer Suggests Tiebreaks at 12-12 to Decide Marathon Matches
headline.main: Federer Suggests Tiebreaks at 12-12 to Decide Marathon Matches
